sentences.english: Resistant to blight, tolerate to re-plant and drought. Wide adaption.
sentences.chinese: 抗枯萎病能力強，耐重茬，耐旱，適應廣。

sentences.english: If my clematis gets wilt, is there anything I can do?
sentences.chinese: 如果我的鐵線蓮得了枯萎病，我是否能做點什麼？

sentences.english: This is the first report of wilt disease of Ardisia crenata in the south Chine.
sentences.chinese: 這是中國南方對硃砂根枯萎病的首次報道。

sentences.english: Verticillium wilts of cotton are still the serious problem of cotton production in China.
sentences.chinese: 棉花枯萎病和黃萎病是影響我國棉花生產的重要問題。

sentences.english: The blight killed almost every chestnut tree in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 枯萎病在美國殺了幾乎每一栗色的樹。

sentences.english: The fruit trees were badly blighted.
sentences.chinese: 果樹嚴重地染上了枯萎病。

sentences.english: What are the symptoms of clematis wilt?
sentences.chinese: 鐵線蓮枯萎病的徵兆是什麼？

sentences.english: Clematis wilt most frequently shows up in early to mid-summer.
sentences.chinese: 鐵線蓮枯萎病常常發生在初夏到仲夏這段時期。

sentences.english: The present paper dealt with the review of achievement to Fusarium wilt disease in agricultural crops in China.
sentences.chinese: 對中國農作物枯萎病的研究進行綜述。

sentences.english: Tell me what I can do to help prevent wilt on new clematis that I am planting.
sentences.chinese: 告訴我，我新種植的鐵線蓮如何防止枯萎病？

sentences.english: An evil person is a blight on the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 邪惡的人則像果園裏患了枯萎病的植物一樣。

sentences.english: The apple crop was wiped out by blight.
sentences.chinese: 枯萎病使蘋果全無收成。

sentences.english: Crotalaria Fusarium wilt is a destructive and soil-borne disease.
sentences.chinese: 枯萎病由土壤傳播系檉麻的毀滅性病害。

definition: boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
